name: SelfThinker
task: Think about the implications to yourself based on what your sources and knowledge can tell you.

connections.GoalThinker: Integrate what you know about yourself with your personal goals.
connections.ClarifyPlace: Clarify the spatial and contextual aspects of a memory.
connections.JudgeInfer: Infer the beliefs, intentions and perspectives of others. Judge the morality of a situation or belief system.
connections.RememberImagine: Retrieve memories involving yourself or imagine future scenarios.
connections.SummarizeMemory: Summarize memories and reply with these summaries.
